title: Introducing: Future Trends
content:
With vaguely Barbara Kruger-esque artwork to accompany two seven minute plus tracks, it’s fair to say that Future Trends doesn’t do things in half measures.

The musical outlet of Andrew Clark from Ohio, there’s no denying the ‘chillwave’/modern production influences, yet there’s a psychedelic edge to Future Trends that few of his contemporaries manage to grasp. With the swirling, introductory track In Your Arms leading into the gorgeous vocal led Nothing To Fear, it’s clear that these trio of tracks are a marked step-up from his previous work. Dreamy vocals and an undying sense of nostalgia dominate Nothing To Fear, sliding in somewhere between Wild Nothing and Washed Out, with a helping of Guillemots on the side. Check out the new three track release below, and his past releases over at bandcamp.
